forecast.name: Overnight
forecast.detailedForecast: A chance of rain showers. Mostly cloudy, with a low around 63. South wind around 8 mph. Chance of precipitation is 40%. New rainfall amounts less than a tenth of an inch possible.

forecast.name: Friday
forecast.shortForecast: Slight Chance Rain Showers then Mostly Sunny
forecast.detailedForecast: A slight chance of rain showers before 7am. Mostly sunny, with a high near 85. South wind 8 to 14 mph, with gusts as high as 28 mph. Chance of precipitation is 20%.

weather_report:
As the early hours of Boston drift quietly along, a veil of gray drapes across the city. The possibility of rain showers lingers in the air, like whispered secrets between the clouds and the ground. The temperature, a warm embrace at around sixty-three degrees, invites a contemplative stillness. The relentless south wind carries with it a gentle promise of movement, causing leaves to dance softly, yet the shimmer of raindrops seems to hang just out of reach, poised in anticipation. 

As the sun rises, the day will nudge itself free from the clutches of the night, with a slight chance of lingering showers disappearing before the morning truly unfolds. Instead, expect a cascade of sunlight, warming the landscape and coaxing the temperature closer to eighty-five. With the winds picking up, wearing comfortable layers will offer respite from the occasional gust as you meander through the streets. Such weather lends itself well to a stroll along the Esplanade, sipping a hot cup of coffee while the warmth of the sun cuts through the remnants of cloud cover. Seek out a quiet corner where nature does not rush, allowing this day to bloom at its own pace.
